channel.title: CVE Feed for Checkmk GmbH -- Checkmk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Checkmk GmbH -- Checkmk

item.title: CVE-2024-6052|2024-09-16T13:57:30.913Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p8, 2.2.0p29, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows users to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements

item.title: CVE-2024-6572|2024-09-09T09:39:17.769Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper host key checking in active check 'Check SFTP Service' and special agent 'VNX quotas and filesystem' in Checkmk before Checkmk 2.3.0p15, 2.2.0p33, 2.1.0p48 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows man-in-the-middle attackers to intercept traffic

item.title: CVE-2024-38858|2024-09-02T09:16:40.902Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of input in Checkmk before version 2.3.0p14 allows attackers to inject and run malicious scripts in the Robotmk logs view.

item.title: CVE-2024-38859|2024-08-26T14:15:32.555Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: XSS in the view page with the SLA column configured in Checkmk versions prior to 2.3.0p14, 2.2.0p33, 2.1.0p47 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allowed malicious users to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements into the SLA column title. These scripts could be executed when the view page was cloned by other users.

item.title: CVE-2024-28829|2024-08-21T19:37:32.708Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Least privilege violation and reliance on untrusted inputs in the mk_informix Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0p12, 2.2.0p32, 2.1.0p47 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local users to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-1742|2024-08-12T18:34:37.823Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Invocation of the sqlplus command with sensitive information in the command line in the mk_oracle Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows the extraction of this information from the process list.

item.title: CVE-2024-38857|2024-08-02T04:19:20.353Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of input in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p8, 2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows attackers to craft malicious links that can facilitate phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-6052|2024-08-01T21:25:03.253Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p10, 2.2.0p29, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows users to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements

item.title: CVE-2024-6163|2024-08-01T21:33:05.146Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Certain http endpoints of Checkmk in Checkmk < 2.3.0p10 < 2.2.0p31, < 2.1.0p46, <= 2.0.0p39 allows remote attacker to bypass authentication and access data

item.title: CVE-2024-6542|2024-08-01T21:41:03.497Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of livestatus command delimiters in mknotifyd in Checkmk <= 2.0.0p39, < 2.1.0p47, < 2.2.0p32 and < 2.3.0p11 allows arbitrary livestatus command execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-5741|2024-08-01T21:18:07.062Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in inventory tree rendering in Checkmk before 2.3.0p7, 2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45 and 2.0.0 (EOL)

item.title: CVE-2024-2380|2024-08-01T19:11:53.480Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in graph rendering in Checkmk <2.3.0b4.

item.title: CVE-2024-6542|2024-07-22T20:26:27.733Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of livestatus command delimiters in mknotifyd in Checkmk <= 2.0.0p39, < 2.1.0p47, < 2.2.0p32 and < 2.3.0p11 allows arbitrary livestatus command execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-5741|2024-07-12T15:59:54.395Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in inventory tree rendering in Checkmk before 2.3.0p7, 2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45 and 2.0.0 (EOL)

item.title: CVE-2024-6052|2024-07-12T12:31:53.666Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p8, 2.2.0p29, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows users to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements

item.title: CVE-2024-28828|2024-07-10T20:17:11.996Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Cross-Site request forgery in Checkmk < 2.3.0p8, < 2.2.0p29, < 2.1.0p45, and <= 2.0.0p39 (EOL) could lead to 1-click compromize of the site.

item.title: CVE-2024-6163|2024-07-08T13:01:38.306Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Certain http endpoints of Checkmk in Checkmk < 2.3.0p10 < 2.2.0p31, < 2.1.0p46, <= 2.0.0p39 allows remote attacker to bypass authentication and access data

item.title: CVE-2024-6052|2024-07-05T12:41:16.600Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p8, 2.2.0p29, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows users to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements

item.title: CVE-2024-38857|2024-07-02T14:02:59.286Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of input in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p8, 2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows attackers to craft malicious links that can facilitate phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-28831|2024-06-28T15:15:14.287Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in some confirmation pop-ups in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p7 and 2.2.0p28 allows Checkmk users to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements into some user input fields that are shown in a confirmation pop-up.

item.title: CVE-2024-28830|2024-06-26T14:02:43.497Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File in Checkmk GmbH's Checkmk versions <2.3.0p7, <2.2.0p28, <2.1.0p45 and <=2.0.0p39 (EOL) causes automation user secrets to be written to audit log files accessible to administrators.

item.title: CVE-2024-28831|2024-06-25T11:45:27.259Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in some confirmation pop-ups in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p7 and 2.2.0p28 allows Checkmk users to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements into some user input fields that are shown in a confirmation pop-up.

item.title: CVE-2024-28832|2024-06-25T11:45:33.371Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in the Crash Report page in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p7, 2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows users with permission to change Global Settings to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements into the Crash Report URL in the Global Settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-28833|2024-06-19T08:12:15.306Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts with two factor authentication methods in Checkmk 2.3 before 2.3.0p6 facilitates brute-forcing of second factor mechanisms.

item.title: CVE-2024-3367|2024-06-13T20:39:25.120Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Argument injection in websphere_mq agent plugin in Checkmk 2.0.0, 2.1.0, <2.2.0p26 and <2.3.0b5 allows local attacker to inject one argument to runmqsc

item.title: CVE-2024-2380|2024-04-05T13:01:08.382Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in graph rendering in Checkmk <2.3.0b4.

item.title: CVE-2024-3367|2024-06-04T17:32:48.744Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Argument injection in websphere_mq agent plugin in Checkmk 2.0.0, 2.1.0, <2.2.0p26 and <2.3.0b5 allows local attacker to inject one argument to runmqsc

item.title: CVE-2024-0638|2024-03-22T10:25:35.675Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Least privilege violation in the Checkmk agent plugins mk_oracle, mk_oracle.ps1, and mk_oracle_crs before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local users to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-1742|2024-03-22T10:26:06.238Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Invocation of the sqlplus command with sensitive information in the command line in the mk_oracle Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows the extraction of this information from the process list.

item.title: CVE-2024-28826|2024-06-05T20:33:54.922Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper restriction of local upload and download paths in check_sftp in Checkmk before 2.3.0p4, 2.2.0p27, 2.1.0p44, and in Checkmk 2.0.0 (EOL) allows attackers with sufficient permissions to configure the check to read and write local files on the Checkmk site server.

item.title: CVE-2024-28824|2024-03-22T10:26:35.280Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Least privilege violation and reliance on untrusted inputs in the mk_informix Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local users to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-28825|2024-06-04T18:03:50.090Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts on some authentication methods in Checkmk before 2.3.0b5 (beta), 2.2.0p26, 2.1.0p43, and in Checkmk 2.0.0 (EOL) facilitates password brute-forcing.

item.title: CVE-2024-28833|2024-06-10T18:12:59.037Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts with two factor authentication methods in Checkmk 2.3 before 2.3.0p6 facilitates brute-forcing of second factor mechanisms.

item.title: CVE-2024-5741|2024-06-17T11:16:59.771Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in inventory tree rendering in Checkmk before 2.3.0p7, 2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45 and 2.0.0 (EOL)

item.description: Least privilege violation and reliance on untrusted inputs in the mk_informix Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local users to escalate privileges.

item.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts with two factor authentication methods in Checkmk 2.3 before 2.3.0p6 facilitates brute-forcing of second factor mechanisms.

item.title: CVE-2024-28830|2024-06-26T07:56:57.020Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File in Checkmk GmbH's Checkmk versions <2.3.0p7, <2.2.0p28, <2.1.0p45 and <=2.0.0p39 (EOL) causes automation user secrets to be written to audit log files accessible to administrators.

item.description: Stored XSS in the Crash Report page in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p7, 2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows users with permission to change Global Settings to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements into the Crash Report URL in the Global Settings.

item.description: Stored XSS in graph rendering in Checkmk <2.3.0b4.

item.description: Incorrect permissions on the Checkmk Windows Agent's data directory in Checkmk < 2.3.0p8, < 2.2.0p29, < 2.1.0p45, and <= 2.0.0p39 (EOL) allows a local attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.
